title: Jackie MacMullan and Amy Stanton
description: Cari Champion sits down with ESPN Senior NBA writer Jackie MacMullan to discuss her book Basketball: A Love Story. Plus, Cari talks with the author of The Feminine Revolution, Amy Stanton.
